section.p: As soon as you have successfully installed , access to the monitoring and log management functionality is enabled for users from OpenStack Horizon. They must fulfill the prerequisites described in the following sections.

section.title: Operator and OpenStack Operator
section.p: The operator is responsible for monitoring , the OpenStack operator is responsible for monitoring the OpenStack services and servers. Both must have access to the OpenStack platform as a user with the monasca-user role or any other role that is authorized to use the functions. Additional roles are optional.
The operator and the OpenStack operator must be assigned to the OpenStack project that was prepared for , for example, monasca.
For details on the project, users, and roles prepared for , refer to .

section.title: Application Operator
section.p: An application operator who is responsible for monitoring a VM must have access to the OpenStack platform as a user with the monasca-user role or any other role that is authorized to use the functions. Additional roles are optional.
The application operator must be assigned to the project for the VM to be monitored.
